scripts.build: nx affected:build; ts-node ./fixup-dist.ts; pnpm run link:cli
scripts.rebuild: pnpm -r exec npx rimraf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml; pnpm i; pnpm run build
scripts.updatePeers: pnpm updatePeers:ui; pnpm updatePeers:cli; pnpm updatePeers:cdk
scripts.version:deps: echo pnpm $(pnpm --version); echo tsc $(tsc --version); echo node $(node --version); nx --version; cenv --version
scripts.version:bump:cli: cd packages/cli && pnpm -r run version:bump prerelease --force
scripts.version:bump:lib: cd packages/lib && pnpm -r run version:bump prerelease --force
scripts.version:bump:ui: cd packages/ui && pnpm -r run version:bump prerelease --force
scripts.version:bump:cdk: cd packages/cdk && pnpm -r run version:bump prerelease --force
scripts.version:bump: pnpm run version:bump:cli &&  pnpm -r version $(cenv -v -s) && pnpm updatePeers
scripts.publish:bump:lib: cd dist/lib && pnpm publish --access public --publish-branch $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.publish:bump:ui: cd dist/ui && pnpm publish --access public --publish-branch $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.publish:bump:cdk: cd dist/cdk && pnpm publish --access public --publish-branch $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.publish:bump:cli: cd dist/cli && pnpm publish --access public --publish-branch $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.publish:bump:all: pnpm run publish:bump:lib && pnpm run publish:bump:ui && pnpm run publish:bump:cdk && pnpm run publish:bump:cli
